name: TOMB GLIDER
description:
TOMB GLIDER - minimalist one-button platformer. 

Evil warlord V.H.S (Velho, Huonomman Suuntainen) has destroyed the great mana crystal that keeps our world turning. Time is running out - can you gather the mana shards from his tomb with the help of your magic headband and make the world function again? 

Instructions: tap to jump, hold to glide.

Game by Juha Pennanen (except music by congusbongus: https://opengameart.org/content/necromancers-tower-nes) - made in 4 days for Finnish College Jam #4. Theme: Aetherpunk, optional diversifier: One button, two functions.
